newsitem.title: USA: Oregon Steel Mills names Corvin as COO.
newsitem.headline: Oregon Steel Mills names Corvin as COO.

text.p: Oregon Steel Mills Inc said Monday it had appointed Joe Corvin as president and chief operating officer of the company.
Oregon Steel Mills said Corvin, 52, would replace Thomas Boklund, who would stay on as chairman of the board and chief executive officer.
Corvin was senior vice president of the company, it said.
Oregon Steel Mills is organized into two divisions. The Oregon Steel division produces steel plate and pipe from plants located in Portland, Oregon; Napa, California; and Camrose, Alberta.
The CF&I Steel Division located in Pueblo, Colorado produces steel rail, rod, bar, wire and tubular products.
